excerpt: My improvement to the education system
html:
Take a set of cubes

Every cube has walls of different colors, 6 different colors each

Randomize the quantity, it might be 17 or it might be 21 cubes

Invite a 4-6 year old kid for a game

Throw the cubes randomly on a table

Make a picture of it

Now reshuffle the positions of the cubes randomly

Ask the kid to put them in the original position

Take another picture

After 15 minutes ask the kid how many cubes were there

For the kid the game is over

Now examine how accurate the kid was with positioning and how well he remembers how many there were over there

Here you go, this is a simplay initial segregation recipe and a way to find brilliant people. Saves a lot of time and effort.
title: The Game of Cubes
